title: Optimize bundle size (code splitting)
description: Reduce the frontend bundle size by implementing code splitting and lazy loading of routes. This improves initial page load time and reduces bandwidth usage.
acceptance_criteria: Implement route-based code splitting with Next.js dynamic imports
Lazy load heavy components (charts, trace viewer, code editors)
Reduce initial bundle size by at least 30%
Add bundle analyzer to track bundle composition
Ensure no flash of unstyled content (FOUC)
Measure and document before/after bundle sizes
implementation_notes: Use next/dynamic for component-level code splitting
Lazy load Monaco editor if used
Use loading.tsx for route-level loading states
